refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The pkcs11.txt file is used to configure initialization parameters for the nss security module and optionally other pkcs #11 modules.
For full documentation visit PKCS #11 Module Specs.

refsection.title: Authors
refsection.para: The nss libraries were written and maintained by developers with Netscape, Red Hat, Sun, Oracle, Mozilla, and Google.
